page.title: 11Some Visitors Comments...
page.content: {"Less windy than anticipated"} "Lundy provides a holiday with a difference.It is well suited to those seeking simplicity of daily routine, peace and relative solitude-and only 11 miles from the mainland...Visitors staying close to the lighthouse should be forewarned of the foghorn" {"Far from the madding crowds" "Easterly gales are the disadvantage -it's very worrying when I have my 36 foot hardboat on Lundy" {"For birdwatchers there is the hope of {some new birds on migration-and the {chance to observe migration taking {place"} "There are no disadvantages as long as one is aware of its remoteness and lack of sophisticated entertainment before one comes". {"..tranquility,birds,sea flowers and {a handsome helicopter pilot"
